section.p: Includes information related to the dental plan or chart for the patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentPlanId with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dentalAlert with data type String
Lists the dental alerts for the patient - e.g. Antibiotic Premed, Sedation Premed, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentFlag with data type String
Flags for treatment plan

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentPlanType with data type Code
Whether the treatment is planned or completed. Possible values are Planned, Completed etc. DRM Plus Program Specific.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentsInGroup with data type Integer
Number of treatments included in this group.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatingSpecialty, where its type is Facility Treating Specialty
Provides an indication of the medical specialty of the organization-location. Examples include Medicine, Surgery, Psychiatry, etc. Related to the "CDR #" in VHA. (TreatingSpeciality is a role):

Contains exactly one [1..1] dentalPatientEncounter, where its type is Encounter Event
Dental Patient Encounter - The patient who is the subject of this dental treatment.

Contains zero or one [0..1] lastClassification, where its type is Dental Classification
Last dental classification of the patient.

Contains at least one [1..*] diagnosis, where its type is Diagnosis
Diagnosis of of a disease or injury.

Contains zero or one [0..1] bedSection, where its type is Ward
"A division in a hospital for the care of a particular group of patients" The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary.

Contains zero or one [0..1] division, where its type is Institution
An identification of an organization at a location.
Contains zero or more [0..*] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer
Contains zero or more [0..*] practitioner, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] primaryProvider, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] treatmentPlanService, where its type is Treatment Plan Service

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentPlanId with data type Id
This is the unique identifier of the dental encounter record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dentalAlert with data type String
Lists the dental alerts for the patient - e.g. Antibiotic Premed, Sedation Premed, etc.

An identification of an organization at a location.
Contains zero or more [0..*] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer
Contains zero or more [0..*] practitioner, where its type is Individual Provider
